com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_client

Class LocalBuildRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_client.LocalBuildRunner

  • public class LocalBuildRunner
extends Object
    Asynchronously runs a Stampede local build. Provides methods to kill/wait/get status codes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
